title: Zsolt Makra
text:
Zsolt Makra (born 24 May 1982 in <a href="Szeged">Szeged</a>) is a <a href="Hungarian%20people">Hungarian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> playing for <a href="B%C3%A9k%C3%A9scsaba%201912%20El%C5%91re%20SE">Békéscsaba 1912 Előre SE</a>.
He had previously played with <a href="Vasas%20SC">Vasas SC</a>, <a href="R%C3%A1kospalotai%20EAC">Rákospalotai EAC</a>, <a href="Gy%C5%91ri%20ETO%20FC">Győri ETO FC</a> and Slovenian club <a href="NK%20Primorje">NK Primorje</a>. In 2008, he signed with Algyő SK, and after one year he moved to <a href="B%C3%A9k%C3%A9scsaba%201912%20El%C5%91re%20SE">Békéscsaba 1912 Előre SE</a>.
